statements: SELECT * FROM project_progress;
SELECT task_name, assigned_to FROM project_progress ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT task_name, completion_status FROM project_progress WHERE assigned_to = 'John Doe';
SELECT assigned_to, due_date FROM project_progress WHERE due_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_id, task_name FROM project_progress WHERE completion_status = TRUE ORDER BY task_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM project_progress WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT task_name, assigned_to, due_date FROM project_progress WHERE completion_status = true;
SELECT * FROM project_progress WHERE due_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY due_date ASC;
SELECT task_id, task_name, assigned_to FROM project_progress WHERE completion_status = false ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_tasks, SUM(CAST(completion_status AS INT)) AS completed_tasks FROM project_progress;
SELECT * FROM task_assignments
SELECT task_name, assigned_to, due_date FROM task_assignments WHERE completion_status = TRUE
SELECT task_name, assigned_to FROM task_assignments WHERE due_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM project_deadlines ORDER BY due_date DESC
SELECT project_name, due_date FROM project_deadlines WHERE completion_status = FALSE
SELECT * FROM task_assignments WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT task_name, assigned_to, due_date FROM task_assignments WHERE due_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT count(*) AS total_tasks, assigned_to FROM task_assignments GROUP BY assigned_to;
SELECT task_name, project_name FROM task_assignments JOIN project_deadlines ON task_assignments.task_id = project_deadlines.project_id;
SELECT task_name, assigned_to FROM task_assignments WHERE task_name LIKE '%report%' ORDER BY due_date ASC, assigned_to DESC;
SELECT * FROM TaskAssignments WHERE completion_status = TRUE
SELECT task_id, assigned_to FROM TaskAssignments ORDER BY due_date DESC
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Projects WHERE start_date < '2023-01-01'
SELECT * FROM TaskDeadlines WHERE reminder_date BETWEEN '2022-05-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT task_id, due_date FROM TaskDeadlines WHERE due_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY due_date ASC
SELECT task_id, assigned_to, due_date, completion_status FROM TaskAssignments WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Projects WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_id, assigned_to, due_date FROM TaskAssignments WHERE due_date < CURRENT_DATE AND completion_status = FALSE;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT task_id, due_date, reminder_date FROM TaskDeadlines WHERE reminder_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM TaskAssignments;
SELECT task_name, assigned_to, due_date FROM TaskAssignments WHERE completion_status = FALSE;
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users WHERE username = 'JohnDoe';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Projects WHERE end_date > CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT deadline_name, due_date, is_completed FROM Deadlines WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM TaskAssignments WHERE assigned_to='John Doe';
SELECT task_name, due_date FROM TaskAssignments WHERE completion_status=FALSE;
SELECT * FROM Projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT project_name, COUNT(*) FROM TaskAssignments JOIN Projects ON TaskAssignments.task_id = Projects.project_id GROUP BY project_name;
SELECT Users.username, Projects.project_name, Deadlines.deadline_name FROM Users JOIN Projects ON Users.user_id = Projects.project_id JOIN Deadlines ON Projects.project_id = Deadlines.project_id;
SELECT * FROM tasks;
SELECT task_name, assignee FROM tasks WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_name, assignee, due_date FROM tasks ORDER BY due_date ASC;
SELECT update_id, task_id, update_date, progress_status FROM progress_updates ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE completion_status = true;
SELECT task_name, assignee, due_date FROM tasks WHERE assignee = 'John Doe';
SELECT task_id, task_name, due_date FROM tasks WHERE due_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT project_name, project_description, start_date, end_date FROM projects ORDER BY end_date DESC;
